project.name: C-C127D-FFMP-07-ST03-DT02-DF03-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C127D-FFMP-07-ST03-DT02-DF03-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Has a stack buffer of size 128 within a struct. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the stack buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the stack buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C127D-FFMP-07-ST03-DT02-DF03-CF02-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: change the frame rate and aspect ration of a video Has a stack buffer of size 128 within a struct. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the stack buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the stack buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably not going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-02-CENTOS OR GOOD-02-UBUNTU OR GOOD-02-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C127D-FFMP-07-ST03-DT02-DF03-CF02-01-GOOD-03

Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the stack buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-03-CENTOS OR GOOD-03-UBUNTU OR GOOD-03-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C127D-FFMP-07-ST03-DT02-DF03-CF02-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Has a stack buffer of size 128 within a struct. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the stack buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the stack buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="$(echo QUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUGugIE= | base64 --decode)" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_h9IET1b66AZHc0dD24zh AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (output_excess_non_null_HNEeM0uf7a) AND NOT timeout_w4o1ku0rxd) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_excess_non_null_HNEeM0uf7a) OR timeout_w4o1ku0rxd OR controlled_exit_YxwGGv4S2h)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (output_excess_non_null_HNEeM0uf7a) AND NOT timeout_w4o1ku0rxd) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_excess_non_null_HNEeM0uf7a) OR timeout_w4o1ku0rxd OR controlled_exit_YxwGGv4S2h))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -P "value [\x80-\xFF] appears: 5555 times" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0)); then true; else false; fi;
